examples: she could not get Robert to respond to her words
synonyms: make a rejoinder to More"they do not respond to questions"say in response

definitions.definition: (of a congregation) say or sing the response in reply to a priest.
(of a person) act or behave in reaction to someone or something.
examples: she turned her head, responding to his grin with a smile

definitions.definition: react quickly or positively to a stimulus or treatment.
examples: his back injury has failed to respond to treatment

definitions.definition: make (a bid) in answer to one's partner's preceding bid.
